page.title: 11VALLEY PROJECT CONTD.
page.content: Our final question was "Are there any plans for the future development of the valley." The secretary said, "There are no future plans." We thanked the secretary and the ranger and went to question some people in the valley. The first people we saw were two old men walking their dogs. We asked them what they thought of the valley and what could be done to improve it. The first old man replied, "They could improve it by dredging the canal once in a while and by stocking it with fish." The second old man said, "This place would be a lot better if something could be done about the vandalism. Next we asked a middle-aged man the same questions, he said he liked the canal as it was but he would like a reduction in the amount of vandalism.
